text: H-hi !! <He looks down at you, expecting>

dialog.text: Oh, s-sorry.. I don't want to bother.. It's just that you have a sword too, b-but not me ! They say i'm too little. That's.. That's unfair !

choices.choice: Looks like you need a hand.

dialog.text: Not me actually! My older brother.. He is one of the Scouts, is name is Gorkr, he left yesterday without his ring ! It's like a lucky charm for him, I don't want him to get hurt.. I'm not allowed to leave the camp, the chief always refuse. If you're allowed to leave, c-could you please give it to him ? Please !!

choices.choice: You'll get one when you grow up. Eventually.
